Ash buried in Antarctica puts date on Taupō supervolcano’s last big blow https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ash-buried-in-antarctica-puts-date-on-taupo-supervolcanos-last-big-blow/T4AVBLTRENCTDDRVVENX4SM66A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ash-buried-in-antarctica-puts-date-on-taupo-supervolcanos-last-big-blow/T4AVBLTRENCTDDRVVENX4SM66A/ Jamie MortonAsh buried deep in Antarctic ice highlights the eruptive power of our famous supervolcano. Mon, 09 Oct 2023 21:40:03 +0000 A study has linked far-flung deposits in Antarctica to Taupō's last known major eruption, while also helping to refine the date at which it took place. Photo / Peter Wilton
